```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(purrr)
library(stringr)
library(here)
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
```

```{r load data, include=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
bowling <- read_csv(here::here("data", "bowling_detailed.csv"))
batting <- read_csv(here::here("data", "batting_detailed.csv"))
fielding <- read_csv(here::here("data", "fielding_detailed.csv"))
keeping <- read_csv(here::here("data", "keeping_detailed.csv"))
```

### Bowling

```{r, layout="l-body-outset"}

bowling %>% 
  filter(Team == "The Nutty Cuckoo Super Kings") %>%
  filter(StartDateTime == max(StartDateTime)) %>%
  select(FirstName, LastName, Over, Ball, RunsConceded, Wickets, BowlingDotBalls, NoBall, Wide) %>%
  mutate(Econ = RunsConceded/Over,
         DotBallPerc = BowlingDotBalls/(Over*5 + Ball)*100) %>%
  kable()

```

### Batting
```{r, layout="l-body-outset"}

batting %>%
  filter(Team == "The Nutty Cuckoo Super Kings") %>%
  filter(StartDateTime == max(StartDateTime)) %>%
  select(FirstName, LastName, Order, RunsScored, BallsFaced, Fours, Sixes, BattingDotBalls) %>%
  mutate(SR = RunsScored/BallsFaced*100,
         DotBallPerc = BattingDotBalls/BallsFaced*100) %>%
  arrange(Order) %>%
  kable()

```

### Fielding
```{r}
fielding  %>%
  filter(Team == "The Nutty Cuckoo Super Kings") %>%
  filter(StartDateTime == max(StartDateTime)) %>%
  select(FirstName, LastName, Catches, RunOuts) %>%
  kable()

```

```{r}
keeping  %>%
  filter(Team == "The Nutty Cuckoo Super Kings") %>%
  filter(StartDateTime == max(StartDateTime)) %>%
  select(FirstName, LastName, Catches, Stumpings, RunOuts, Byes) %>%
  kable()

```
